articles.title: David Ellison Meets the Press
articles.summary: "We're ready to move past the noise," the CEO said, despite the lobbed questions geared toward Trump, '60 Minutes' independence, artificial intelligence and FCC maneuvering.

articles.title: Roblox opens up AI system that helps detect predatory language in chats
articles.summary: Roblox, the online gaming platform wildly popular with children and teenagers, is rolling out an open-source version of an artificial intelligence system it says can help preemptively detect predatory language in game chats.
